titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3) to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions and to provide for conscience protections, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-71, by Mr. Nugent.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the report of the Committee on Rules 112-71 shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended, are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 33.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 237.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 177 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/2/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3) to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions and to provide for conscience protections.
